text: Celebrities reacted with grief and disbelief to the news Friday that country singer Troy Gentry of Montgomery Gentry died in a helicopter crash in New Jersey just before the band was due to perform at a resort. TROY GENTRY DIES IN NEW JERSEY HELICOPTER CRASH Gentry, 50, and bandmate Eddie Montgomery made a lasting impact in country music history, achieving success with five No. 1 hits. The band was also inducted into the Grand Ole Opry in 2009.
